      • moveLeft

        public void moveLeft()
        Move the paddle to the left by the default amount. Prevents the paddle from going too far off the edge of the world.

      • moveRight

        public void moveRight()
        Move the paddle to the right by the default amount. Prevents the paddle from going too far off the edge of the world.

      • moveUp

      • moveDown
